channel.title: What do you want to see on the next server?
channel.description:
I am currently creating Boomscape V/10 And I wanted everyones opinion on what should be on there. I have one runescape like server and another one thats I want to edit alot and put what everyone wants on there :]
Please tell me, Just do not post dumb things.

item.title: What do you want to see on the next server?
item.dc:creator: @2pure4u 2pure4u
item.description:
@2pure4u wrote:

I want… a pretty puppy, tell me when you add that and I’ll join.

On a serious note, I’d want lots of npcs, slow exp rates if the server is good, fast ones if the server is pking or bad.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want to see on the next server?
